author: Katie
review: Overall a great experience living here. The people in the office are so nice and very helpful.

author: kaitlin g
review: The staff is very rude. And they dont leave you alone. I understand that its their job to get people to move in, but they kept calling and emailing me several times a day. The expected me to bring a deposit on the day of my tour. After

author: Samantha Mantey
review: Worst experience of my life living here. Neighbors rude claiming my dog was barking all day. Had to get a camera to prove he wasn't. They also charge you for noise complaints with no evidence. My car was stolen from the garage they have no

ownerResponse.text:
I would like to point out that once I reviewed your file I was able to remove the charges you owed at your move out and you now do not owe anything. I am sorry that you had a bad experience here with past management.
-Belleau Woods Apartments

author: Yarrow Decker
review: 4006 building is a disaster compared to the other buildings. This one seems to be ignored as far as landscaping. I think maybe its because they get money from the government to house people with disabilities, and there is no incentive for them to impress new prospects.

ownerResponse.text: We have not received any complaints in our office from you in regards to the landscaping. If there is an issue, please let us know and I would be happy to reach out to the landscaper. We have always addressed your work orders in a timely  More

author: Seldom Pearce
review: I am currently in my second year long lease agreement with them and I am very pleased. They do not claim to be a low-income housing property, and this is one of the reasons my partner and I chose the complex. Despite this, their prices are

author: Trace Evans
review: Where to begin. I have been renting with this complex for almost 4 years. I take my finances seriously and make it a point to drop my rent check off first thing every 1st of the month. Over the last 4-5 months they have accused me 3 times

author: Emmanuel Waore
review: This complex is great. The rent is reasonable for the size of the unit. The main office staff is friendly and helpful as well as the on site maintenance team who are efficient and resourceful at fixing problems. It's has pet friendly units

author: Katrina Anonymous
review: Worst place to rent, they suck you dry, the pull all the money they can outta you the threaten you with claims, most of the fees are bogus Not worth it! They changed their managment again for the 6 time since I was there. They told me that

author: Rex Roussell
review: I worked here for 2 months. They told me there was raises every couple months. And that it was a long term position so I quit my job with job security to try this place. Kelly knowing that I would only take the job if it was to be long term

author: Renae L (Rusche)
review: The maintenance staff are nice, but the office staff don't seem to know what they're doing. My roommate and I have gotten a few false notices about money owed or non-payment on things when we have proof our checks cleared properly. A few

author: Sub Scorpion
review: recommend not living here. management will lie to you in order to benefit. also make sure when moving out to keep a copy of every document and statements of proper procedure other wise they will falsely claim lack of proper notice. and make

author: Raf Xander
review:
Pros:
- Relatively close to WCC, The Guide Meridian and bus stops
- Online portal for rental payment and maintainence requests

author: Dawn Magana
review: Bad management, not at all friendly.... They take care of the area around the office, but we havent had walk ways around the resident buildings presser washer in about two years they used to do that every spring or summer. Appliances are

author: Kylie
review: Kelly is absolutely horrible. Worst management ever. The girls in the office are super sweet, but every month I have had an issue. Kelly just wants to steal all your money, and shell bump your late fees up every month, and bounce your

author: Renee Chadwick
review: I've enjoyed living here and never had any problems with the management or maintenance staff. They have always been quick to respond and are very helpful. The only thing that worries me is the amount of strange people walking around stalking vehicles but we have some amazing people who live here that do walk arounds.

author: Elle13 Roses
review: Nasty staff! Nasty attitudes! Rats everywhere.. junkies outside blasting loud music at the Hotel next door. Homeless people going thru the mail and trash. No security or real matainece ever unless you beg. Management is a chain-smoker never

author: Heather Hulford
review: Very hard working staff. Quick to handle work orders and always friendly.

author: Tyler Ford
review: Lived for ~1year horrible service, they dont care about tennents. They refuse to install cameras in parking garages where cars are "frequently" broken into because no one can see them do it its actually safer to park outside. Their

author: rainen
review: Do you like buildings that aren't protected or monitored? Where people can literally urinate, defecate and destroy the tenants property without the managenent doing anything at all to help? Well then belleau woods is the place for you.

author: Elizabeth JR
review: Never live here. I still contest to that fact that living here as made my anxiety go to an all time high. I can not wait until the day our lease is up to get the hell out because of all the craziness. Place is disgusting with urine, garbage

author: Anna Melnyk
review: Seriously the WORST MANAGEMENT  ever!! I strongly recommend for no one to live there because of their staff! They will get the last penny out of your pocket when youll be moving out ! They rip people off ! I had a lot of problems with then while living in their apartments . If they change their management maybe it will get better !!

author: Joseph Pham
review: They promise that they have apt at the end September when i went there to apply my application , so i believed and said to my old apt i would leave. However, the belleau woods called back and said they didn't have apartment.. Money plus

author: Rey Sibay
review:
Rent is reasonable for the size of the unit, but there were a few problems with my shower and some things with the kitchen.
One lady in particular who works in the office needs to work on her professionalism, she comes off short/rude.

author: Ravageritual X
review: 1/11 We have had gun shots fired within the complex 3 times in the last 2 months and the owner has taken zero action. He has not even addressed the issue through an email. Plan on moving to a place with less **gunfire**.

ownerResponse.text: The Bellingham Police Department responded to this situation and has done their job. The shooting was not related to any of the residents in this complex.

author: Cougar Holliman
review: Would've gave it 0 stars if it were possible. Great area and buildings but absolutely horrific management and ownership. If you enjoy being harassed on the regular by the people in the leasing office then this is the place for you, however, if you want to live and let live this is not the place for you  .

author: Arminda Luciano
review: This is one of the worst apt. complexes I've ever resided in. The owners are thieves, they over charge for rent, many appliances have gone bad, the elevator was always malfunctioning, and they have way too many rules for tenants! It's like

author: Theresia Russell (TT)
review: new rentee: filthy carpets, broken disposal (6 wks, not fixed) washer leaks,  patio needs maintenance. Really gone down hill. Rented here 2 years ago and was much better.

author: Jimmy O'Connor
review: Kris Wentworth was extremely rude and will not answer mine or my lawyers calls. He modified the contract hours after we signed the pre-lease papers, which in turn makes the contract null and void.

author: charlie defreest
review: There are many bad reviews of this place on the web and they all are true! Do NOT come live here! The staff are incompetent and irresponsible. My car was wrongly vandalized by the staff and they refused to fix it. They don't care at all about the people who live here.

author: Esther Kukhahn
review: Lots of apartments at this place. Easy to get turned around. But over all nice places in the middle of Bellingham.

author: AJ MB
review: They make you pay 40$ to apply even though there is are 13 people behind you on the waiting list. I would avoid this place .

author: Trevor Haverkamp
review: Not clean when we moved in, unprofessional management, never rent here its not worth it.

author: Doc. Vendiola
review: Miscommunication, charging us on things that weren't out fault, poor management. DO NOT RENT HERE!

author: M Vongola
review: WE HAD A WASP NEST IN A WALLL AND WE MENTIONED IT FOR MONTHS THEU NEVER DID ANYTHING.

author: angel eyes
review: Realy rude staff.......bad service........big no

author: Deadlift zach
review: Bad Bad Bad Bad service!!

author: taran Kaur
review: Nice place

author: Roman Murray
review: It also holds a good job for percent things.
